div.p: Welcome to our coworking community. We invite you to explore our spaces, connect with like-minded individuals, and embrace the joy of collaboration and creativity.

section.class: s_text_image pb80 o_cc pt128 o_colored_level o_cc2

img.alt: brown leather couch near brown wooden table

div.p: Our coworking spaces offer flexible solutions tailored to meet the needs of freelancers, startups, and established businesses. Experience a dynamic environment designed for productivity and collaboration.
Start with the community – discover what they need and provide it for them.

section.class: s_image_text_overlap pt64 pb64 o_cc o_cc4 o_colored_level

div.p: Reserve a shared desk for the entire day at 45 EUR and enjoy a productive workspace tailored to your needs. Whether you’re diving into deep work or connecting with fellow professionals, our vibrant community and comfortable environment have you covered.

section.class: s_title o_cc o_cc5 pb0 pt64 o_colored_level
s_company_team pt48 pb48 o_cc o_cc5 o_colored_level

div.p: Dedicated professionals fueling our growth
Chief Executive Officer
Founder and chief innovator, Tony is the heart of our coworking vision. He actively engages in developing our community, marketing strategies, and enhancing member experiences.
Chief Community Officer
Mich thrives on creating collaborative environments. With years of experience in community building, Mich has been instrumental in shaping our coworking culture. Mich is a visionary leader.
Chief Operations Officer
Aline is passionate about fostering connections. She supports over 100 members and cultivates a vibrant community of entrepreneurs and freelancers.
Chief Community Officer
Alex, with his extensive background in coworking, helps us cultivate a thriving community. He is passionate about enhancing member experiences and driving innovation within our spaces.

div.p: Curious to see how our coworking space can elevate your workday? Book a tour with us and experience firsthand the vibrant community, inspiring environment, and top-notch amenities designed to help you thrive. Whether you need a quiet nook for focused work or a collaborative space to brainstorm, we’ve got you covered.

img.alt: A dining room with a table and chairs and a large window

div.class: o_grid_item o_cc g-col-lg-6 rounded order-lg-0 o_cc1 o_colored_level col-lg-6 g-height-10
div.p: Our coworking space is designed with your success in mind. We provide flexible membership plans, high-speed internet, comfortable workstations, and a vibrant community of entrepreneurs, freelancers, and creatives. Beyond just a desk, we offer a place to collaborate, innovate, and grow your business in a supportive environment.

Whether you need a private office, a dedicated desk, or a hot desk, our space adapts to your needs. Plus, our on-site events and workshops give you the chance to expand your network and skills — all while enjoying a beautiful, inspiring workspace.

section.class: s_text_image o_cc o_cc5 pb128 o_colored_level pt56

div.p: Welcome to our coworking community! We invite you to embrace a respectful, collaborative atmosphere where creativity and productivity flourish.

Please help us maintain a peaceful and inclusive environment by being mindful of noise, sharing resources, and keeping common areas tidy. Together, we create a space where everyone can focus, connect, and succeed.

img.alt: brown leather couch near brown wooden table

section.class: s_three_columns o_cc pt32 pb32 o_colored_level o_cc4

div.class: s_card card h-100 o_cc my-0 shadow o_cc5 o_card_img_top o_colored_level

img.alt: white and blue paper on pink surface

div.p: If you encounter any problems or notice something that needs fixing, please don’t hesitate to report it. We’re committed to maintaining a smooth and comfortable environment, and your feedback helps us keep everything running perfectly.

div.class: s_card card h-100 o_cc my-0 o_cc5 o_colored_level shadow o_card_img_top

div.p: Easily reserve one of our fully equipped meeting rooms to host your team discussions, client presentations, or brainstorming sessions. Our professional spaces are designed to help you collaborate effectively.

t.t-value: [sort for sort in website_sale_sortable if sort[0]==request.params.get('order', '')]

div.t-attf-class: oe_website_sale {{opt_wsale_fullwidth and 'container-fluid o_wsale_page_fluid' or 'o_wsale_page_contained container'}} {{layout_mode == 'list' and 'o_wsale_layout_list' or 'o_wsale_layout_catalog'}} {{opt_wsale_categories_top and 'o_wsale_has_filmstrip'}} {{opt_wsale_floating_bar and 'o_wsale_has_floating_bar'}} {{hasLeftColumn and 'o_wsale_has_sidebar'}} {{editionPreviews and 'o_wsale_edit_preview_enabled'}}

aside.class: d-none d-lg-block position-sticky align-self-start col clearfix

div.class: o_wsale_products_grid_before_rail vh-100 ms-n2 pt-2 px-lg-2 pb-lg-5 ps-2 overflow-y-scroll

div.t-att-class: 'products_categories' + (' accordion accordion-flush' if is_sidebar_collapsible else ' mb-3')

div.t-if: attrib_values or tags or ( show_price_filter and isFilteringByPrice )

t.t-valuef: {{is_sidebar_collapsible and 'accordion accordion-flush'}} {{is_sidebar_collapsible and (opt_wsale_categories or len(attributes) > 0) and 'border-top'}}

t.t-value: category or opt_wsale_categories_top or (not opt_wsale_floating_bar and (opt_wsale_attributes_top or is_view_active('website_sale.search') or is_view_active('website_sale.sort') or hasPricelistDropdown))

header.t-attf-class: d-flex flex-column gap-2 {{_header_has_content and 'py-3' or (not _header_has_content and not opt_wsale_design_grid and 'py-3')}}

t.t-valuef: d-none d-lg-flex w-100 p-0 mb-0 small

h1.t-attf-class: d-flex gap-1 align-items-center mb-0 lh-lg {{search and 'base-fs font-sans-serif' or 'fs-3'}} {{search and bool(category) and 'mb-2'}}

a.t-if: (search and not category) or (not search and category)
a.t-att-href: keep('%s/category/%s' % (shop_path, slug(category.parent_id))) if category.parent_id else keep(shop_path, search=0)

t.t: Drag building blocks here to customize the header for "" category.

div.class: products_header btn-toolbar flex-nowrap align-items-center justify-content-between gap-1 gap-lg-2 gap-xl-3

div.t-attf-class: o_wsale_products_header_search_form_container {{ _has_all_sibligns and 'd-none d-sm-inline-block'}} col-xl-5 me-auto {{not hasLeftColumn and 'col-xl-6'}}

a.t-attf-class: btn o_not_editable {{_has_all_sibligns and 'd-inline-block d-sm-none' or 'd-none'}} me-auto btn-{{navClass}}
a.title: Search Products

button.t-attf-class: btn btn-{{navClass}} position-relative {{not wsale_has_filters_btn_lg and 'd-lg-none'}} {{not is_view_active('website_sale.search') and 'ms-auto'}} text-nowrap
button.title: Filters

small.t-attf-class: ms-1 {{(hasPricelistDropdown and is_view_active('website_sale.search') and is_view_active('website_sale.sort')) and 'd-none d-md-inline-block'}}

span.t-attf-class: position-absolute top-0 start-100 translate-middle border border-{{navClass}} rounded-circle bg-danger p-1

header.div: No results found for ''. Showing results for ''.

t.t-value: (not hasLeftColumn and ppr == 4) or (opt_wsale_fullwidth and ppr > 3)
grid_md_allow_custom_cols and ('g-col-md-' + str(col_width)) or grid_md_use_3col and 'g-col-md-4' or 'g-col-md-6'

t.p: No product defined in this category.

div.div: Click 'New' in the top-right corner to create your first product.

div.t-attf-class: products_pager d-flex justify-content-center {{opt_wsale_design_grid and 'py-4' or 'py-5 pb-4'}}

t.t: Drag building blocks here to customize the footer for "" category.

div.t-attf-class: o_record_cover_container d-flex flex-column h-100 o_colored_level o_cc #{_cp.get('background_color_class')} #{use_size and _cp.get('resize_class')} #{use_text_align and _cp.get('text_align_class')} #{additionnal_classes}
